content: the pattern contains general description of work progress video tutorials and diagrams please note that subtitles in the videos are provided in russian language only pattern skill level beginner **you will need** 250* gr of etrofil puzzle yarn 55% cotton 45% acrylic crochet hook 3 5 mm or another hook to match your yarn auxiliary hook one size or half a size bigger and one size or half a size smaller stitch markers tapestry needle scissors *the pattern calls for only one cake of yarn **abbreviations pattern notes** to make the scarf the following crochet skills are required chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet available additional instructions for complementary design - bubbles **size** the scarf is designed for an adult - either women or men the finished scarf dimensions are 30 cm width x 200 cm length the scarf is made in one piece using turning row starting from the side the final piece is of the rectangular shape the design is reversible - there is no right or wrong side of the scarf
